text: Mani ndagim, guma mbe, ana Zerusareman ki, ana zɨ Simeon. Ana guigira tɨvir vhuuiŋra mbui guma ma. Ana vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararav, ana zazera Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi zɨn vui guma ma. Ana vhɨra mba Isrerin kurkurav mben simtɨgi ndiv ndava mɨɨtɨgar mben nɨɨn zav zi guma ganɨ zav, anan rarga ki. Simeon Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar guigira ana phorga ki.
